metaDescription: ESSENCE III DOLORES: Luxury 3-bed Town Houses in Dolores from €259,000. New build by MORENO Y PARTNERS. Ready June 2026. International community.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to ESSENCE III DOLORES, an exceptional new development by MORENO Y PARTNERS in the heart of Sector 2, Dolores. This prestigious project features carefully designed 3-bedroom Town Houses starting from €259,000, offering the perfect blend of modern living and affordability on the Costa Blanca. Each property spans 87m² of beautifully finished living space with premium finishes, contemporary architecture, and access to exclusive community amenities. Scheduled for completion on 01-06-2026, ESSENCE III DOLORES represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Alicante's most sought-after residential areas. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday retreat, or investment property with strong rental potential, these Town Houses combine quality construction, strategic location, and exceptional value. MORENO Y PARTNERS brings decades of expertise to this development, ensuring every detail meets the highest standards. Located just minutes from Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and essential amenities, Dolores offers the complete Costa Blanca lifestyle that international buyers are seeking.

locationSection.intro: Sector 2, Dolores is a thriving residential enclave that perfectly captures the essence of Costa Blanca living. This established neighborhood combines peaceful suburban character with convenient access to world-class amenities and natural attractions. Dolores has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish culture combined with modern comforts and excellent infrastructure. The area is renowned for its welcoming expat community where English is widely spoken, making it ideal for overseas investors and relocating families. The town benefits from excellent connectivity, with Alicante Airport just 30 minutes away and a comprehensive network of local services including private healthcare clinics, international schools, and modern shopping centers. The Mediterranean climate, proximity to pristine beaches, and access to championship golf courses make Dolores an increasingly attractive investment destination showing +8% year-on-year property value growth.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from local Spanish cuisine to international options

propertyFeatures.intro: ESSENCE III DOLORES Town Houses are constructed to the highest standards by MORENO Y PARTNERS, combining contemporary design with practical family living. Each property features premium finishes throughout, energy-efficient systems, and carefully planned layouts that maximize comfort and functionality. The development showcases modern architectural styling with clean lines and abundant natural light. Construction quality includes reinforced concrete structures, thermal insulation, and professional workmanship that ensures durability and low maintenance. Every detail has been considered to create homes that will provide lasting enjoyment and strong investment returns in the competitive Costa Blanca property market.

content.investmentSection: ESSENCE III DOLORES represents a compelling investment opportunity in a market showing consistent growth. Dolores properties have appreciated at +8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing many European markets while remaining 40% more affordable than comparable Spanish island properties. The rental market is strong with 7-night holiday rentals commanding €800, providing excellent income potential for investor-owners. The area attracts diverse tenant profiles including families seeking temporary relocations, holiday makers preferring authentic Costa Blanca experiences, and retirees exploring long-term living options. MORENO Y PARTNERS' reputation ensures quality construction that appeals to discerning renters and buyers alike. The established international community and English-speaking infrastructure reduce management complexities. With delivery scheduled for June 2026, early investors can capitalize on pre-completion pricing while the region continues its upward valuation trajectory.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ESSENCE III DOLORES?
faqs.answer: ESSENCE III DOLORES Town Houses start from €259,000. Each property features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and 87m² of built area. Current pricing represents exceptional value in the Dolores market. Contact us for detailed pricing on available units and payment plan options.

faqs.question: When will ESSENCE III DOLORES be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for 01-06-2026. MORENO Y PARTNERS provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Early purchasers benefit from fixed pricing and flexible completion payments. Contact us for specific delivery schedules and handover arrangements.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ESSENCE III DOLORES?
faqs.answer: MORENO Y PARTNERS is the developer, bringing extensive expertise in Costa Blanca property development. They maintain high construction standards, professional project management, and a commitment to customer satisfaction. Their reputation for quality makes ESSENCE III DOLORES a secure investment choice.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca offers excellent investment fundamentals with properties appreciating +8% year-on-year. The region has an established international community with English commonly spoken, making it accessible for overseas buyers. Lifestyle benefits include multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses, quality healthcare, and modern infrastructure. Property costs are significantly lower than northern Europe, while offering superior climate and lifestyle.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain with minimal restrictions. Non-EU citizens require a Spanish tax identification number (NIE). MORENO Y PARTNERS and our legal partners assist with all documentation and regulatory requirements. No visa is required specifically for property purchase, though you may obtain residence permits based on property investment or rental income.

faqs.question: How far is ESSENCE III DOLORES from the beach?
faqs.answer: ESSENCE III DOLORES is approximately 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches, offering excellent beach access for lifestyle and leisure. The Costa Blanca coastline features pristine Mediterranean beaches with excellent facilities, water sports, and beachfront restaurants.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ESSENCE III DOLORES?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for daily shopping, a regional hospital within 30 minutes plus private clinics available, several championship golf courses nearby, International schools with British curriculum options, and established restaurants serving both Spanish and international cuisine. Public transport via bus connections is available, though a car is recommended for flexibility.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: In addition to the property purchase price, budget for transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.3-0.5%), registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). For ESSENCE III DOLORES at €259,000, expect total acquisition costs around €35,000-€40,000. Ongoing costs include property tax, community fees, and utilities. Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns for each purchase.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property tax (IBI) in Dolores averages 0.4-0.6% of cadastral value. Community fees for ESSENCE III DOLORES cover maintenance, pool, and gardens. Rental income is taxed at standard rates. Non-resident property owners pay wealth tax on properties exceeding €600,000 value. Our advisors provide complete tax planning guidance specific to your situation and residency status.

content.conclusion: ESSENCE III DOLORES represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire premium Town Houses in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations at prices significantly below comparable island developments. With completion scheduled for June 2026, strong +8% annual appreciation, excellent rental income potential of €800 per week, and the backing of trusted developer MORENO Y PARTNERS, this development offers both lifestyle benefits and solid investment returns. The established international community, English-speaking infrastructure, and proximity to beaches and golf courses create an ideal environment for families, retirees, and investors seeking authentic Mediterranean living with modern convenience. Whether you're seeking a holiday home, primary residence, or investment property, ESSENCE III DOLORES delivers comprehensive value. Contact us today via WhatsApp or email to request detailed information, view virtual tours, or schedule a site visit. Our team is here to guide you through the purchase process and answer any questions about this exceptional development.
